name: Recycle
effect: Activate the effect of any regular consumable item that has been used this scene. You determine the target of the item. Each individual item can only be recycled once. (ex: If an ally consumes a reviver seed and the Recycle User copies it, another ally can be revived and Recycle will be unable to use reviver seed for the rest of combat.)
description: One Pokemon's trash is another one's treasure.
